actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the dumping of spent oil shale on any Federal land other than Federal land leased for the operation of shale oil recovery facilities.

summary.text: Prohibits the placing of spent oil shale, overburden, or byproducts from the recovery of other minerals found with oil shale, on any Federal land other than Federal land which has been leased for the recovery of shale oil under the Mineral Lands Leasing Act.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the dumping of spent oil shale on any Federal land other than Federal land leased for the operation of shale oil recovery facilities.
